::Aerotaur::
    He let the dragon leave.  After he was gone, Aerotaur flew down and into 
the ship.  He had heard Termitron say that the queen is dead.  He knew that 
meant Nightlight.  But how?  He had locked up Gramps.  He wandered through 
the base and found Gramps' body.  He opened the first door nearby.
